description:
Inflection AI is a public benefit corporation leveraging our world class large language model to build the first AI platform focused on the needs of the enterprise. 

Inflection AI was re-founded in March of 2024 and our leadership team has assembled a team of kind, innovative, and collaborative individuals focused on building enterprise AI solutions. We are an organization passionate about what we are building, enjoy working together and strive to hire people with diverse backgrounds and experience. 

Our first product, Pi, provides an empathetic and conversational chatbot. Pi is a first public instance of building from our 350B+ frontier model with our sophisticated fine-tuning (10M+ examples), inference, and orchestration platform. We are now focusing on building new systems that directly support the needs of enterprise customers using this same approach

Want to work with us? Have questions? Apply to job below or reach out to us with questions!
name: Inflection AI
tagline: Enterprise AI that works for you - a scalable and tunable platform built around a 350B+ frontier large language model

updates.text: We are excited to welcome this incredible team - please learn more about how we will be integrating their automation and AI expertise:

Did you hear the news? We launched agentic workflows and acquired Boundaryless Group. Hear from our CPO Ian McCarthy on how this product update and this team’s automation expertise makes Inflection for Enterprise even more powerful.

Should companies own their AI? Inflection AI believes they should! 

They are partnering with Intel Corporation, Dell Technologies and UiPath to offer AI solutions with custom models trained on their data and running on-prem or in private clouds. 

I had a chance to sit down with Inflection AI's COO Ted Shelton to talk about the company's new direction, the new Inflection 3 models and their enterprise AI offerings. We also discuss some of the top challenges enterprise are facing with AI adoption.

Check out the full episode here - https://lnkd.in/gExdej2m
Hear directly from Reid Hoffman on why his first call for a new CEO was to Dr. Sean White plus more on our enterprise focus

Inflection AI and #Intel have announced Inflection for Enterprise, an industry-first, enterprise-grade #GenAI platform powered by #IntelGaudi 3 accelerators and Intel Tiber Cloud.

This AI co-worker provides the control, customization and scalability required for complex, large-scale deployments, all while delivering empathetic, conversational, employee-friendly AI capabilities.

Read the full story here: https://intel.ly/3YdGzYZ
Introducing Inflection for Enterprise + our collaboration with Intel Corporation:
Have you heard this podcast from our CEO Sean White and co-founder Reid Hoffman? We'd love to hear your thoughts?
We are delighted to announce our collaboration with the Data Transfer Initiative - please read on to learn more about the future of Pi

Today, I'm thrilled to announce three talented new hires joining me at Inflection AI: Vibhu Mittal, Ted Shelton, and Ian McCarthy. With their combined expertise in science, technology, operations, and product, we're excited to see how they'll accelerate the amazing user experience of Pi to power better customer experiences for our commercial partners. 

As we continue to innovate and improve, I'd love to hear your favorite story about Pi so far. How has Pi made a difference in your life or business? And how do you see Pi improving your interactions with the businesses in your life? 

Join us on this journey as we embed emotional AI in business bots. Check out the exclusive announcement on VentureBeat: https://lnkd.in/gB9hCsT6
